title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: langchain-ai/langchain (Ollama integration)
summary: LangChain LLM interface for Ollama, enabling retrieval-augmented generation and agentic workflows with local models.

title: ollama-js on npm
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and list models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python on PyPI
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; simple API to run and manage local LLMs.

title: ollama-webui/ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed Open WebUI); supports RAG, multimodal, and admin features.

title: jmorganca/ollama-python (legacy)
summary: Early unofficial Python SDK; functionality merged into official ollama/ollama-python.

title: ollama-rag on PyPI
summary: Lightweight CLI tool to build RAG pipelines with Ollama and ChromaDB.

title: ollama-cli on npm
summary: Community-built interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, featuring markdown and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot on GitHub
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-discord on GitHub
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that answers questions using Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack on GitHub
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama; deploy to Fly.io in one click.

title: ollama4j on GitHub & Maven
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama; supports chat, generate, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-rs on crates.io
summary: Rust client library for Ollama with async/await and streaming support.

title: ollama-csharp on GitHub
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, and list models from C#.

title: ollama-gui on PyPI
summary: Simple Tkinter-based desktop GUI to chat with Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack by deepset
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama; use local models in production-grade NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-helm on GitHub
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-models on Hugging Face
summary: Official Ollama organization on Hugging Face hosting GGUF quantized models ready for import.

title: ollama-rag-langchain on GitHub
summary: Example repo showing RAG with Ollama, LangChain, and ChromaDB in <100 lines.

title: ollama-dagger on GitHub
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered apps.
